name: Ultimate Zario
description:
A simple-version of the Super Mario game. The player starts from a starting point on the map, can walk left and right and jump, interact with different tools on the map, earn rewards, beat enemies, and reach the final point on the map.

Input:

Movement: Arrow keys.

Jump: Space.

Throw rock: “R”

Open the menu: “Tab”

Shoot fireballs after eating the item “fire egg”: "E"

Action: Player movements, shoot, kill enemies, eat items.

Obstacle:The enemy is continuously walking on the map, if the player collides into it, the player will die. 

Goal: Players need to go from the starting point to the final point on the map without dying more than 5 times. Player needs to avoid or kill enemies. Players can eat some helpful items to reach the final point.
